item.title: iptables 的一些学习总结。
item.description: iptables 的一些学习笔记。 netfilter 有 几个hook，分别有不同的功能。 PREROUTING: Triggered by the NF_IP_PRE_ROUTING hook. INPUT: Triggered by the NF_IP_LOCAL_IN hook. FORWARD: Triggered by the NF_IP_FORWARD hook. OUTPUT: Triggered by the NF_IP_LOCAL_OUT hook. POSTROUTING: Triggered by the NF_IP_POST_ROUTING hook. Tables↓/Chain
